sources.name: Barro Lee Education Dataset: Educational Attainment (average years of total education)
sources.description:
Description:
Data published by Data byBarro, Robert and Jong-Wha Lee


Linkhttp://www.barrolee.com/
Retrieved6 June 2016. Christopher Farris kindly provided this dataset and shared it with Max Roser via email.

Additional information

Citation: Barro, Robert and Jong-Wha Lee, April 2010, "A New Data Set of Educational Attainment in the World, 1950-2010." Journal of Development Economics, vol 104, pp.184-198.

The data is taken from the Barro-Lee Educational Attainment Dataset and is available here. It shows average years of schooling of the population aged 15 and over.

variables.name: Barro Lee Education Dataset: Educational Attainment (average years of total education)
